newsitem.title: HONG KONG: St.Dennis cuts Dong-Jun stake by 11.6 pct.
newsitem.headline: St.Dennis cuts Dong-Jun stake by 11.6 pct.

text.p: Controlling shareholder St. Dennis Ltd has cut its shareholding in Dong-Jun (Holdings) Ltd by 91.47 million shares or 11.6 percent of the company's issued share capital, the Hong Kong stock exchange said on Monday.
The transaction was made between December 5 and 11, the exchange said in a statement, but it gave no detail on the level of St. Dennis' current holding in Dong-Jun.
St. Dennis held about 73.11 percent of Dong-Jun, formerly Hop Ying International Ltd, at close of a cash offer in October.
Dong-Jun shares rose HK$0.01 to HK$1.16 in early afternoon.
